name: Anudeep Nautiyal
title: Restoration Office Admin
bio:
* Delivered customer satisfaction scores consistently above 80 while supporting a US‑based financial process.
* Promoted to Claims Specialist for exceptional performance in handling complex and high‑priority cases. 
* Reduced customer service resolution time by 30% and claims processing time by 20%. 
* Utilized Quantum software and CRM tools to streamline workflows and improve claims accuracy.
* Managed high ticket volumes with minimal escalations while collaborating across teams to meet SLAs.

name: Gagan Rana
title: Office Admin
bio:
A result oriented professional with (5+) Five plus Years of total experience in multi-disciplinary areas requiring diversified skills. Last associated with Allianz as Team Lead in Customer Relations department.
Major involvement in all aspects of Customer Relations, Tech Sales. A Professional with proactive attitude, ownership taking, personality, always open for trying and implementing new better / effective ways to minimizing the inputs required for maximum output, flexible, fully operational to seize up demanding
deadlines. Possesses strong leadership, excellent communication, planning, people management,
Presentation and time management skills. Skilled to handle different kinds of work environment with adaptable behavior, personality and nature.

name: Manya Arora
title: Admin
bio:
Experienced in handling inbound calls( US Process), resolving customer issues, and maintaining professionalism across service‑focused roles.
Strong ability to manage complex customer complaints with empathy and effective communication.
Consistently participates in training and team meetings to enhance knowledge and performance. 
Equipped with strong communication, problem‑solving, project management, and computer literacy skills.
Won multiple awards for customer service.

name: Aman Vijetra
title: Admin
bio:
Handles international customer interactions professionally through voice support at I Energizer (US Based process).
Efficiently resolves customer queries while ensuring high quality standards and process adherence.
Maintains strong customer satisfaction using effective communication and problem‑solving skills. 
Previously supported Zomato customers by resolving order‑related issues and ensuring positive experiences.
Brings core strengths in customer service, time management, teamwork, and basic computer proficiency.

name: Anshul Uppal
title: Admin
bio:
Procurement & Supply Chain Specialist with strong experience in construction purchasing, vendor
negotiations, inventory forecasting, and hospital supply operations. Managed $2M+ procurement projects at
Caivan, optimized medical supply chain at The Ottawa Hospital, and supervised high-volume retail operations
at Shoppers Drug Mart. Skilled in SAP, Oracle, AS400, Newstar, RFQs/RFPs, PO management, vendor
performance, cost optimization, and multi-site logistics.

name: Pulkit Parvinda
title: Admin
bio:
 Estimating software: proficient in Xactimate - sketching floor plans, applying line items, and generating detailed estimates.
 CRM & job management: experienced with dash - scheduling jobs, managing documentation, tracking job progress, and coordinating with field teams.
 Gained exposure to insurance claim processes and restoration compliance standards.
 Restoration industry knowledge: in-depth understanding of restoration job types and workflows including:
1. Water mitigation
2. Fire damage restoration
3. Mold remediation
4. Contents cleaning and inventory
